Layer Outline: The 10 canonical Quranic readings (القراءات العشر) - determines the broader reading tradition
Specific narrations/transmissions (الروايات) - each Qiraah has 2 primary narrations
Complete manuscript text for each narration
Foundational metadata for Qiraat systems and narrations
Verse enumeration and boundaries - primary organizational unit
Sentences Slices which is a group of words based on Grammatical composition or or Scholarily Decision
Writing system rules (Uthmani vs Qiasy/Imla'i scripts with orthographic transformations)
Base letter sequences with phonetic metadata - atomic units of Quranic text
